*Stats for Data Science* is a forward-looking introductory-level textbook currently in draft form. Each chapter ~~has~~ will have a short tutorial introducing the computing techniques relevant to that chapter. The tutorials from the initial chapters may be helpful to those starting out with R.

* [Starting out with R](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/SDS-starting-out/)
* [Basics of the R language](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/SDS-language/)
* [Functions and arguments](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/SDS-functions/)
* [Accessing data](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/SDS-data/)
* [Data graphics](https://dtkaplan.shinyapps.io/SDS-graphics)
